{{also|太仆}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=太仆}}

===Etymology===
This position originated in the [[w:Zhou Dynasty|Zhou Dynasty]]. Originally, this person served as the emperor's personal messenger. By the time of the [[w:Han Dynasty|Han Dynasty]], this person was placed in charge of taking care of the imperial horses and chariots.
